00006 #ifndef _FU_FILE_H_
00007 #define _FU_FILE_H_
00008 
00009 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FUFile
00010 {
00011 public:
00012     enum Mode
00013     {
00014         READ,
00015         WRITE
00016     };
00017 
00018 private:
00019     FILE* filePtr;
00020     
00021 public:
00022     FUFile(const fstring& filename, Mode mode);
00023     FUFile(const fchar* filename, Mode mode);
00024     FUFile();
00025     ~FUFile();
00026     
00027     inline bool Open(const fstring& filename, Mode mode) { return Open(filename.c_str(), mode); }
00028     bool Open(const fchar* filename, Mode mode);
00029     bool IsOpen() { return filePtr != NULL; }
00030 
00031     // Retrieve the file info
00032     size_t GetLength();
00033     FILE* GetHandle() { return filePtr; }
00034 
00035     // Writes/Reads in a piece of the file from/into the given buffer
00036     bool Read(void* buffer, size_t length);
00037     bool Write(const void* buffer, size_t length);
00038 
00039     // Flush/close the file stream
00040     void Flush();
00041     void Close();
00042 };
